lead_paragraph: Ronaldinho scored twice to help Barcelona beat Recreativo Huelva, 3-0, and stretch its lead in the Spanish league. Real Madrid moved past Valencia into second place with a 2-1 victory at Gimnastic Tarragona.
snippet: Ronaldinho scored twice to help Barcelona beat Recreativo Huelva, 3-0, and stretch its lead in the Spanish league. Real Madrid moved past Valencia into second place with a 2-1 victory at Gimnastic Tarragona.
